name: Revenge of the Damned

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: The quiet of a cairn grinds away even the strongest of souls. I’d thought this silence a testament to their unusual obedience, and, in a way, I was correct. Once I saw the pit of damned kinstones, I knew this clan was the same as all others — no stranger to disagreements or strict punishment. Once, long ago, I would’ve admired such Judgement. But what place do I have to think of that now.
